item.title: Sampath Dechu
item.description: About my passion and expertise: I am passionate about architecting technology solutions for automation and optimization of enterprise operations. My expertise lies in design and development of data-driven cloud-native computational software solutions and platforms. Currently, I am mostly looking at application of pattern mining and artificial intelligence methods. About my approach: My approach involves: Understanding business requirements and personas Discover the opportunities for technology intervention Exploration of technology stack (largely open source or PaaS) Evaluation of applicability of state of the art computational methods from academia Minimum viable product design & continuous validation with users.
